text: a large number of Sikh devotees had
gathered in the sprawling and impressive
campus of the Golden Temple to take part
in the ceremony to mark the 30th
anniversary of the of the attacks inside
the temple the the military action that
is known as Operation Blue Star in 1984
as today was the 30th anniversary and
what we are told that the clashes
occurred following a small dispute of a
very minor dispute as to who would
address the ceremony first one group
wanted to address first the other
opposed it and that led to clashes
people started attacking each other with
swords with sticks which left a dozen
people injured and and now the police
has restored calm prayer services have
been restored and some arrests have been
made by the police
